confidence.explanation: The candidate showed high confidence with a score of 7.5/10. This excellent assessment is based on voice tone, posture, eye contact, and facial expressions. Eye contact was maintained 75.0% of the time, and posture indicators showed 0.85 alignment. The candidate demonstrated strong self-assurance and clear communication.

positivity.explanation: Positivity was high with a score of 8.2/10. The candidate's warmth and friendly demeanor were excellent. Genuine smiles were detected in 12 frames, with 85.0% being authentic. The candidate created a warm, approachable impression with natural positive expressions.

professionalism.explanation: Professionalism was moderate with a score of 6.8/10. The candidate's professional demeanor and emotional control were satisfactory. Appropriate emotions were displayed 82.0% of the time, with composure maintained at 0.78. The candidate showed adequate professionalism with generally appropriate behavior.

engagement.explanation: Engagement was high with a score of 7.3/10. The candidate's attention and interaction level were excellent. Eye contact was maintained 70.0% of the time, with facial responsiveness at 75.0%. Head movements indicated 0.80 active listening. The candidate was highly engaged with strong attention and active participation.
